text: Ārau muchāra bābē āmi traiśa raātira pratiśrauti karaichilō ārau daha yōga karai sēẏā pūrṇa karaichilō. Ē'idaraē tē'ōm̐ra pratipālakara nirdhāraita samaẏa calliśa raātita pūrṇa haichila. Muchā'i tē'ōm̐ra bhātr̥ hāraunaka ka’lē, ‘mōra anupasthitita mōra sampradāẏara mājata tumi mōra pratinidhitba karaibā, sanśōdhana karaibā ārau biparyaẏa sr̥ṣṭikāraīsakalara patha anusaraṇa nakaraibā’
